Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: Using GenAI I can get more immediate feedback in terms of formatting and wording, however with a teacher/TA/tutor I feel like I ca get more feedback with the content itself

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: I feel more comfortable asking GenAI multiple questions, whereas I am aware that asking a teacher in person takes time away from other students/can make me feel a little stupid if I still don't understand after they have tried explaining multiple times.
